Attribute.AttributeName: System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.DesignerSerializer("System.Windows.Forms.Design.ToolStripMenuItemCodeDomSerializer, System.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a", "System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.CodeDomSerializer, System.Design, Version=4.0.0.0, Culture=neutral, PublicKeyToken=b03f5f7f11d50a3a")

summary.span: 表示 或 上显示的可选选项。

span.span: Represents a selectable option displayed on a or .

summary.span: 尽管 替换了早期版本的 控件并添加了功能；但是也可选择保留 以备向后兼容和将来使用。

span.span: Although replaces and adds functionality to the control of previous versions, is retained for both backward compatibility and future use if you choose.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 是适用于和来处理菜单的特殊突出显示、 布局和列排列。 is a that works with and to handle the special highlighting, layout, and column arrangement for menus. 为了使若要显示，你必须将其添加到或。In order for a to be displayed, you must add it to a or . 类提供了使你能够配置的外观和功能的菜单项的属性。The class provides properties that enable you to configure the appearance and functionality of a menu item. 若要显示的菜单项旁边的复选标记，请使用属性。To display a check mark next to a menu item, use the property. 使用此功能来确定的互相排斥的菜单项列表中选择的菜单项。Use this feature to identify a menu item that is selected in a list of mutually exclusive menu items. 例如，如果你有一组用于设置中文本的颜色的菜单项控制，请使用属性来标识当前选定的颜色。For example, if you have a set of menu items for setting the color of text in a control, use the property to identify which color is currently selected. 使用属性来定义某一键盘组合可以按下选择的菜单项。Use the property to define a keyboard combination that can be pressed to select the menu item. ## Examples 下面的代码示例将添加的指定的菜单项。The following code example adds a to the specified menu items of a . 此代码示例是一个更大的示例中提供的一部分类概述。This code example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStripMerge#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStripMerge/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStripMerge#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStripMerge/VB/form1.vb#2)]

summary.span: 获取或设置一个值，该值指示是否选中 。

span.span: if the is checked or is in an indeterminate state; otherwise, .
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 属性返回`false`当且仅当处于未选中状态。The property returns `false` if and only if the is unchecked. 从开始在.NET Framework 4.5.2，选中或不确定项时，可能会调整其相应的图标。Starting with the .NET Framework 4.5.2, when an item is checked or indeterminate, the corresponding icon may be resized. 调整大小取决于系统 DPI 设置时 app.config 文件包含以下条目：Resizing is determined by the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` ```

remarks.format: ## Remarks 有关处理事件的详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information about handling events, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用此成员。The following code example demonstrates the use of this member. 在示例中，事件处理程序报告的匹配项事件。In the example, an event handler reports on the occurrence of the event. 此报告可帮助您了解当发生事件，并可以帮助您进行调试。This report helps you to learn when the event occurs and can assist you in debugging. 若要报告或频繁发生的事件上多个事件，请考虑替换与或追加到一个多行消息。To report on multiple events or on events that occur frequently, consider replacing with or appending the message to a multiline . 若要运行此代码示例，请将其粘贴到包含类型的实例的项目名为`ToolStripMenuItem1`。To run the example code, paste it into a project that contains an instance of type named `ToolStripMenuItem1`. 然后，确保与事件处理程序事件。Then ensure that the event handler is associated with the event. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#495](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#495)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#495](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#495)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性可控制或确定是否则最初检查，取消选中后，或处于不确定状态。Use the property to control or determine whether a is initially checked, unchecked, or in an indeterminate state. 从.NET Framework 4.5.2，开始，如果属性设置为或，可能会对应的图标大小调整。Starting with the .NET Framework 4.5.2, if the property is set to or , the corresponding icon may be resized. 调整大小取决于系统 DPI 设置时 app.config 文件包含以下条目：Resizing is determined by the system DPI setting when the app.config file contains the following entry: ``` ```

[!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#496](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/CS/EventExamples.cs#496)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples#496](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.EventExamples/VB/EventExamples.vb#496)]

MemberSignature.Value: protected override System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject CreateAccessibilityInstance ();
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance class System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject CreateAccessibilityInstance() cil managed
Protected Overrides Function CreateAccessibilityInstance () As AccessibleObject
protected: override System::Windows::Forms::AccessibleObject ^ CreateAccessibilityInstance();

summary.span: 为 创建一个新的辅助功能对象。

span.span: Creates a new accessibility object for the .
A new for the .

remarks.format: ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何重写方法来创建具有辅助功能的图表控件，并使用和类来公开可访问的信息。The following code example demonstrates overriding the method to create an accessibility-aware chart control, using the and classes to expose accessible information. 该控件绘制图例以及两条曲线。The control plots two curves along with a legend. `ChartControlAccessibleObject`类，该类派生自`ControlAccessibleObject`，在使用方法以提供为图表控件的自定义可访问的信息。The `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class, which derives from `ControlAccessibleObject`, is used in the method to provide custom accessible information for the chart control. 因为图表图例不是实际-基于控制，但改为绘制图表控件中，通过它不提供任何内置的可访问信息。Because the chart legend is not an actual -based control, but instead is drawn by the chart control, it does not any built-in accessible information. 因此，`ChartControlAccessibleObject`类重写方法以返回`CurveLegendAccessibleObject`，表示将图例的每个部分的访问信息。Because of this, the `ChartControlAccessibleObject` class overrides the method to return the `CurveLegendAccessibleObject` that represents accessible information for each part of the legend. 当辅助功能的应用程序使用此控件时，该控件可以提供所需的可访问信息。When an accessible-aware application uses this control, the control can provide the necessary accessible information. 此代码示例是，请参阅完整的代码示例的一部分类概述。This code example is part of a complete code example that can be found at the class overview. [!code-cpp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#2](~/samples/snippets/cpp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CPP/chartcontrol.cpp#2)] [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/CS/chartcontrol.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.AccessibleObject/VB/chartcontrol.vb#2)]

remarks.format: ## Remarks 重写在派生类中配置的默认大小。Override in derived classes to configure a default size for a . 这是比在控件的构造函数中设置大小更有效。This is more efficient than setting the size in the control's constructor.

MemberSignature.Value: protected override void Dispose (bool disposing);
.method familyhidebysig virtual instance void Dispose(bool disposing) cil managed
Protected Overrides Sub Dispose (disposing As Boolean)
protected: override void Dispose(bool disposing);

param.name: disposing
param.span: 若要释放托管资源和非托管资源，则为 ；若仅释放非托管资源，则为 。

span.span: to release both managed and unmanaged resources; to release only unmanaged resources.

summary.span: 释放由 占用的非托管资源，还可以另外再释放托管资源。

span.span: Releases the unmanaged resources used by the and optionally releases the managed resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 此方法称为由公共`Dispose`方法和方法。This method is called by the public `Dispose` method and the method. `Dispose` 调用受保护`Dispose(Boolean)`方法替换`disposing`参数设置为`true`。`Dispose` invokes the protected `Dispose(Boolean)` method with the `disposing` parameter set to `true`. 调用`Dispose`与`disposing`设置为`false`。 invokes `Dispose` with `disposing` set to `false`. 当`disposing`参数为 true 时，此方法释放由任何托管对象持有的全部资源此引用。When the `disposing` parameter is true, this method releases all resources held by any managed objects that this references. 此方法调用每个引用对象的 `Dispose` 方法。This method invokes the `Dispose` method of each referenced object.

para.span: 可以由其他对象多次调用。

span.span: can be called multiple times by other objects.

para.span: 在重写请注意不要引用已释放的以前调用中的对象。

span.span: When overriding be careful not to reference objects that have been previously disposed of in an earlier call to .

para.span: 有关如何实现详细信息，请参阅[实现 Dispose 方法](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md)。

span.span: For more information about how to implement , see [Implementing a Dispose Method](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/implementing-dispose.md).

para.span: 有关详细信息和，请参阅[清洗向上非托管资源](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md)和[重写 Finalize 方法](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3)。

span.span: For more information about and , see [Cleaning Up Unmanaged Resources](~/docs/standard/garbage-collection/unmanaged.md) and [Overriding the Finalize Method](http://msdn.microsoft.com/library/8026cb68-fe93-43fc-96c1-c09ad7d64cd3).

remarks.format: ## Remarks 引发事件时，将通过委托调用事件处理程序。Raising an event invokes the event handler through a delegate. 有关详细信息，请参阅[处理和引发事件](~/docs/standard/events/index.md)。For more information, see [Handling and Raising Events](~/docs/standard/events/index.md). 方法还允许派生类对事件进行处理而不必附加委托。The method also allows derived classes to handle the event without attaching a delegate. 这是在派生类中处理事件的首选技术。This is the preferred technique for handling the event in a derived class.

para.span: 在派生类中重写 时，一定要调用基类的 方法，以便已注册的委托对事件进行接收。

span.span: When overriding in a derived class, be sure to call the base class's method so that registered delegates receive the event.

summary.span: 获取或设置快捷键文本。

span.span: Gets or sets the shortcut key text.
A representing the shortcut key.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用此属性来获取或设置显示的快捷键的文本。Use this property to get or set the text that is displayed as the shortcut key. ## Examples 以下示例将分配到指定的文本。The following example assigns the specified text to the . 此示例摘自更大的示例中提供类概述。This example is part of a larger example available in the class overview. [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStripMerge#2](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStripMerge/CS/form1.cs#2)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStripMerge#2](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.ContextMenuStripMerge/VB/form1.vb#2)]

.property instance valuetype System.Windows.Forms.Keys ShortcutKeys

summary.span: 获取或设置与 关联的快捷键。

span.span: Gets or sets the shortcut keys associated with the .
One of the values.
The default is .

remarks.format: ## Remarks 使用属性将键组合分配给菜单命令，如 CTRL + C 为**复制**命令。Use the property to assign a key combination to a menu command, such as CTRL+C for the **Copy** command. 你可以使用键盘快捷方式，而非或除了的菜单或菜单项与 ALT 键使用带下划线的字母的访问密钥。You can use shortcut keys instead of or in addition to access keys, which are underscored letters in menus or menu items used with the ALT key. 你想要使用的访问密钥的字母前通过键入与号 (&) 在代码中定义的访问键。Define access keys in code by typing an ampersand (&) before the letter you want to use for an access key. ## Examples 下面的代码示例演示如何使用要分配给菜单项的组合键 CTRL + P 属性调用`printToolStripMenuItem`。The following code example demonstrates how to use the property to assign the key combination CTRL+P to a menu item called `printToolStripMenuItem`. 有关完整示例，请参阅[如何： 将 Web 浏览器功能添加 Windows 窗体应用程序](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md)。For the complete example, see [How to: Add Web Browser Capabilities to a Windows Forms Application](~/docs/framework/winforms/controls/how-to-add-web-browser-capabilities-to-a-windows-forms-application.md). [!code-csharp[System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser#100](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser/CS/form1.cs#100)] [!code-vb[System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser#100](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Winforms/System.Windows.Forms.WebBrowser/VB/form1.vb#100)]

exception.span: 该属性未设置为 值之一。

span.span: The property was not set to one of the values.
